Miles Sound System SDK 6.6h

Overview for Xbox

Discussion

Miles is now available for Microsoft's powerful Xbox console. The Xbox is really great to develop for - good tools plus robust hardware is a nice combination.

The Xbox version of Miles is actually the most sophisicated version - it is highly optimized and supports the hardware intimately.

Miles is extremely easy to use and integrate under this platform. We'll discuss everything you need to know to get up and running!
